title: Drawing, "Still Life with Tea Cup and Textiles on a Stone Base", 1876
medium: Graphite, brush and watercolors on light gray paper [?]
signed: Signed and dated in brown ink, left bottom corner: R. Riordan / 76.
dimensions: 13.3 x 12.5 cm; Framing paperboard: 23.1 x 17.8 cm.
description: Vertical view showing a Japanese tea cup and textiles, and a few botoanical motifs upon a stone base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Still Life with Tea Cup and Textiles on a Stone Base", 1876.
1876. Graphite, brush and watercolors on light gray paper [?]. Gift of Mrs. Samuel Colman. 1939-85-1.
